text: Ara ami musake pratisruti diyechi trisa ratrira ebam seguloke purna karechi aro dasa dbara. Bastutah ebhabe callisa ratera meyada purna haye geche. Ara musa tamra bha'i harunake balalena, amara sampradaye tumi amara pratinidhi hisabe thaka. Tadera sansodhana karate thaka ebam hangama srstikaridera pathe calo na.
